se.jguru.nazgul.core.reflection.api.conversion

Interface TypeConverter<From,To>


  • public interface TypeConverter<From,To>
    Generic type conversion specification.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canConvert(From instance)
      Validates if this TypeConverter is able to convert the provided instance.
      To convert(From instance)
      Converts the provided instance to the resulting type.
      Class<From> getFromType() 
      Class<To> getToType() 

    • Method Detail

      • getToType

        Class<To> getToType()
        Returns:
        The target type of this TypeConverter.

      • getFromType

        Class<From> getFromType()
        Returns:
        The source type of this TypeConverter.

      • canConvert

        boolean canConvert(From instance)
        Validates if this TypeConverter is able to convert the provided instance.
        Parameters:
        instance - The instance which should be validated for conversion.
        Returns:
        true if this JaxbTransportTypeConverter can package the provided instance for transport and false otherwise.

      • convert

        To convert(From instance)
        Converts the provided instance to the resulting type.
        Parameters:
        instance - The instance to convert.
        Returns:
        The converted instance of type To.
